title: Losing connection to League
body: So, this is a pretty common isssue for me. I have a relatively stable connection and play at 60 ping. Sometimes i just lose connection to League, and Discord. When i run a internetcheck i still have 60 ping and normal up/download rate. I can't figure out what the problem is. Please help.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble staying connected in general.  Are you by chance running on both ethernet and wireless; I'm wondering if maybe it's switching randomly and causing you to lose some strength.  I recommend going over our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help you strengthen your connection and get you back in the game.  I hope that helps!
